title: Ninaithu Ninaithu Male Song Lyrics 7G Rainbow Colony
stanzas: <div>Ninaithu Ninaithu Male Song Lyrics 7G Rainbow Colony

Ninaithu ninaithu paarthen
nerungi vilagi nadanthen
unnaalthaane naane vazhgiren
o o oh unnil indru
ennai paarkiren

eduthu padithu mudikkum munne
eriyum kaditham
edharkku penne
unnaalthaane naane vazhgiren
o o oh unnil indru
ennai paarkiren

amarndhu pesum
marangalin nizhalum
unnai kaetkum
eppadi solven
udhirndhu pona
malarin mounamaa

thoodhu pesum
kolusin oliyai
araigal kaetkum
eppadi solven
udainthu pona
valayal pesumaa

ullangaiyil veppam
serkkum viralgal indru engae
tholil saaindhu kadhaigal
pesa mugamum illai ingae

Pesipona vaarthaigal ellaam
kaalanthorum kadhinil ketkum
saambal karaiyum
vaarthai karaiyumaa

paarthupona paarvaigal ellam
pagazhum iravum
kelvigal kaetkum
uyirum pogum
uruvam pogumaa

thodarnthu vandha
nizhalum ingae
theeyil serndhu pogum
thiruttu pona thadayam
paarthum nambavillai
naanum
